alert.note: Alert for Hillsborough (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 9:03AM EDT until August 30 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Alafia River At Riverview near US 301 affecting Hillsborough County. Alafia River At Lithia affecting Hillsborough County. .Storm surge caused by Hurricane Idalia has caused record flooding on the Alafia river at Riverview. In addition, minor flooding is forecast at Lithia. For the Alafia...including Lithia , Riverview near US 301...Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring and major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Alafia River at Riverview near US 301. * WHEN...Until late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 6.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 4.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM EDT Wednesday was 6.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate above flood stage with a maximum value of 6.1 feet late this morning. It will fall below flood stage late this afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - Flood History...This is a historic crest and it exceeds a previous crest of 6.2 feet on 09/06/2004. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (9 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Alafia River Riverview near US 4.2 6.5 Wed 8 am 0.5 -0.6 -0.9 -0.7 0.5 &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 930 PM EDT.
